posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob Bannon
Hi,

Thanks to several members who have helped me get my list down a bit, but still a long way to go. I am looking for low grade T206's. Here is what I still need:

Posted By: Christopher
I have a few hits from your list.   They are graded either PSA 4 or SGC 50.   Check the T206 page on my website if interested...

Posted By: Martin Neal
Hi Bob,

   I have 28 from your list that I could sell. Includes a really beat Lajoie, Dahlen Brooklyn, Keeler with bat, Evers (cubs), Bresnahan with bat, and a Duffy. If interested, please call me at 434-825-6792.

Martin
